description: Built scalable Vertex AI pipelines, improving model deployment speed by 40% and reducing latency by 35%.
Engineered Cloud Functions as runtime tools for Gemini LLM, maintaining 99.8% uptime under production load.
Designed client workflows using Pub/Sub and Cloud Run, increasing API throughput by 25% overall.
Created RAG-powered agents, improving automation accuracy by 30% while reducing manual operations by 40%.
Optimized system-level runtime containers reducing cloud compute costs 20% across multiple inference workloads.

experience.company: Wisconsin School of Business & Tuck School of Business
description: Implemented GPT-3.5 sentiment models identifying 12% negative sentiment increase after major unionization events.
Fine-tuned BERT classifiers improving precision by 18% and reducing API inference cost 25% overall.
Built CLIP-based multimodal price prediction model, improving accuracy by 23% over previous baselines.
Automated Python-SQL ETL workflows reducing preprocessing time by 40% and increasing data reliability significantly.

experience.company: UW College of Agricultural & Life Sciences
description: Trained ResNet50 and YOLOv8 models improving detection accuracy 25% and precision 15% through augmentation.
Developed CLIP-based semi-supervised auto-labeling pipeline reducing manual labeling effort 80% overall.
Deployed ML pipelines on AWS SageMaker cutting compute overhead 30% and storage inefficiencies 20%.
Collaborated with growers translating model outputs into actionable insights improving agricultural efficiency.

projects.title: AutoML-ify: Automate Your Machine Learning Pipeline Effortlessly
projects.description: Launched a no-code AutoML tool to automate EDA, model selection, and tuning, reducing initial machine learning project setup time from 4 hours to 30 minutes. Integrated over 10 classification and regression algorithms with RandomizedSearchCV and Plotly visualizations, improving baseline validation AUC by an average of 8%.
projects.problem: High initial setup time for machine learning projects and the need for automated model selection and tuning.
projects.approach: Developed a no-code AutoML tool integrating multiple classification and regression algorithms with RandomizedSearchCV and Plotly visualizations.
results: Reduced initial machine learning project setup time from 4 hours to 30 minutes
Improved baseline validation AUC by an average of 8%

projects.title: MLOps Weather Prediction
projects.description: Deployed an XGBoost forecasting microservice that achieved a Mean Absolute Error of 2 degrees C and scaled to handle over 1,000 requests per hour. Established an automated, MLflow-driven retraining workflow that monitored and corrected for concept drift, reducing prediction error drift by 20% over a 6-month period.
projects.problem: Need for a scalable weather prediction service and a robust MLOps workflow to handle concept drift.
projects.approach: Deployed an XGBoost forecasting microservice and implemented an automated, MLflow-driven retraining workflow for concept drift monitoring and correction.
results: Achieved a Mean Absolute Error of 2 degrees C
Scaled to handle over 1,000 requests per hour
Reduced prediction error drift by 20% over a 6-month period
